docs.lead_paragraph: Merger talks between Dow Chemical Co and DuPont are likely to have been precipitated by shareholder pressure and weakening demand for crop-protection chemicals, and such a deal would have been unlikely even a few months ago.

headline.main: Dow-DuPont Talks Driven by Investor Pressure, Weak Farm Demand
headline.print_headline: Dow-DuPont Talks Driven by Investor Pressure, Weak Farm Demand

docs.snippet: Merger talks between Dow Chemical Co and DuPont are likely to have been precipitated by shareholder pressure and weakening demand for crop-protection chemicals, and such a deal would have been unlikely even a few months ago.

docs.lead_paragraph: A potential marriage of chemicals titans Dow Chemical and DuPont would draw intense scrutiny from regulators in the United States and other countries, but Wall Street welcomed the reported merger talks, lifting shares of both companies by 12 percent.

headline.main: Dow, DuPont Soar on Prospect of $130 Billion Merger 'Christmas Present'
headline.print_headline: Dow, DuPont Soar on Prospect of $130 Billion Merger 'Christmas Present'

docs.snippet: A potential marriage of chemicals titans Dow Chemical and DuPont would draw intense scrutiny from regulators in the United States and other countries, but Wall Street welcomed the reported merger talks, lifting shares of both companies by 12 percent.

docs.lead_paragraph: Life expectancy in the United States has stalled for three straight years, the government announced Wednesday.

docs.lead_paragraph: Feeling cold more often after losing weight probably has to do with a loss of insulating body fat, but medical problems could also be a factor.
